DOC.brief_summary: We propose study effect hemodynamics ( blood pressure , cardiac output , central venous pressure ) two dos bupivacaine spinal anesthesia cesarean section : high dose 12 mg low dose 4.5 mg. We examine recovery time , incidence hypotension , compare pain control maternal satisfaction cesarean section . We hypothesize low dose bupivacaine spinal anesthesia provide equivalent anesthesia cesarean section compare conventional dose bupivacaine , less hypotension , fast recovery time , enhance maternal satisfaction . Maternal satisfaction assess self-reported pain score , incidence nausea vomiting , shiver , ability interact baby OR .
DOC.brief_title: Hemodynamic Effects Low Dose Spinal Anesthesia Cesarean Section
DOC.detailed_description: Hypothesis It hypothesize low dose spinal anesthesia provide equivalent anesthesia cesarean section high conventional dose spinal anesthesia , less hypotension , fast recovery enhance maternal satisfaction . Patient Population Adult female elective , repeat cesarean section give informed consent . Exclusion Criteria - Contraindications dural puncture - BMI > 40 - Elective C/S present labour rupture membrane - Placenta previa accrete Methodology Patients screen antenatal clinic Women 's Hospital , Health Sciences Centre ( HSC ) , Winnipeg one regularly schedule visit . If patient schedule another antenatal clinic city , ask obstetrician briefly mention study potential study patient , interested give consent form take home read . We phone patient , obtain verbal consent discus question may . On morning procedure obtain write consent , answer additional question may . Alternatively , patient approach obstetrician clinic , interested give option go Pre-Anesthesia Clinic HSC member study team discus study obtain write consent . Potential patient provide information regard study consent obtain prior enrollment study . Forty patient randomize two group : 1 . Conventional dose spinal anesthesia 2 . Low dose spinal anesthesia . Randomization occur via sealed envelope prior schedule cesarean section . The patient blind randomization . All woman standard monitor . In addition , radial arterial line insert continuous blood pressure measurement cardiac output measurement use FloTrac sensor Vigileo monitor ( cardiac output monitor use arterial waveform analysis , Edwards Life Sciences ) . All woman receive preload 500ml Ringers Lactate solution intravenously . The conventional dose control group receive spinal anesthetic consist hyperbaric bupivacaine 1.2cc ( 9mg ) fentanyl 15mg preservative free morphine 150mcg . The patient sit position dural puncture position supine , leave lateral tilt position anesthetic solution give . Once block height establish patient place 20-30 degree trendelenberg cesarean section . The low-dose spinal group receive spinal anesthetic consist hyperbaric bupivacaine 4.5mg fentanyl 15mg preservative free morphine 150mcg . The patient position side , right side head 20-30 degree dural puncture position supine leave lateral tilt position anesthetic solution give . The OR table keep 20-30 degree head cesarean section . Blood pressure monitor continuously . Cardiac output measurement do immediately prior administer spinal immediately position leave lateral tilt position every five minute end operation . All woman instruct use patient control analgesia ( PCA ) remifentanil infusion use cesarean section experience discomfort . If adequate , 60-70 % nitrous oxide attempt . If adequate pain control establish cesarean section near completion , conversion general anesthetic next step . All woman receive rectal naproxen conclusion surgery unless contraindication bleeding concern . All woman receive prophylactic ondansetron intraoperatively unless contraindication . Decreases mean blood pressure great 20 % baseline le 90 mm Hg define hypotension treat incremental dos phenylephrine ( 50-100mcg IV ) ephedrine ( 5mg ) maternal heart rate le 60 bpm . A 500cc lactated ringer bolus co-administered initiation spinal anesthetic . Further fluid administer goal approximately 1-1.5 liter intraoperatively . Each patient addition receive 20 unit Oxytocin 500cc saline . Additional fluid uterotonics give necessary bleeding hypotension take account end . Levels sensory motor blockade record prior skin prep , follow arrival recovery room every 30 minute thereafter . Sensory block monitor dermatome level loss sensation ice . Motor blockade check use modify Bromage score ( 0 = impairment , 1 = unable raise extend legs able move knee ankle , 2 = unable raise extend legs flex knee able move foot , 3 = unable flex ankle , knee hip ) . Maternal satisfaction assess self report pain score , nausea/vomiting , shiver , ability interact baby OR . Outcome measure include follow 1 . Hemodynamics ( BP , heart rate ( HR ) , Cardiac Index ) 2 . Time completion spinal anesthetic ( skin puncture position leave lateral tilt position ) 3 . Surgical time ( skin incision skin closure ) 4 . Total remifentanil administration procedure 5 . Total phenylephrine administration procedure 6 . Administration sedatives/anti-emetics 7 . Fetal cord blood gas ( arterial venous ) Apgar score 8 . Maternal satisfaction score 9 . Bilateral sensory block level Bromage score arrival PACU every 30 minute patient discharge ready 10 . Time discharge ready PACU 11 . Complications ( difficult spinal , PDPH ) Outcome 1 6 record intraoperatively ( average time 90 120 minute ) . Outcomes 6 10 record post anesthesia care unit ( PACU ) ( average stay 4 6 hour ) . Outcome 11 record duration patient 's hospital stay . Patients follow duration hospital stay ( estimate three day ) . Statistical Analysis Statistical analysis do Biostatistical Consulting Unit University Manitoba . It consist analysis variance repeat measure continuous variable , student 's T-test Chi square analysis non-parametric variable . P < 0.05 consider statistically significant . We propose study 20 patient group .
